biotools.summary:
Inferring expression changes in sorting-based CRISPR screens.

MAUDE: Mean Alterations Using Discrete Expression.

MAUDE is an R package for finding differences in means of normally distributed (or nearly so) data, via measuring abundances in discrete bins.

bioschemas.name: MAUDE
